description: Detects the import of a alternate datastream to the registry with regedit.exe.
author: Oddvar Moe
Sander Wiebing
oscd.community
name: Imports Registry Key From an ADS
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\regedit.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGEDIT.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:("*\ \/i\ *" OR "*.reg*") AND (process.command_line:/:[^ \\]/))) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:("*\ \/e\ *" OR "*\ \/a\ *" OR "*\ \/c\ *" OR "*\ \-e\ *" OR "*\ \-a\ *" OR "*\ \-c\ *")))
